Class AltAutomatonDrawer

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawer

    public class AltAutomatonDrawer
extends AutomatonDrawer<AltAutomaton>
    This class provides an implementation of drawing alternating automata.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
